subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: What is the capital of Rajasthan?
explanation_en: Jaipur is the capital of Rajasthan.
explanation_hi_long: राजस्थान के राजधानी की जानकारी है कि Jaipur का वर्ला, जो राजस्थान की राजधानी है।
explanation_en_long: The capital of Rajasthan is Jaipur, which stands for Vrindavan. Jaipur is the capital city of Rajasthan.
explanation_en_short: Jaipur is the capital of Rajasthan.
question_en: What is the capital of Rajasthan?
question_en_long: What is the capital of Rajasthan and its historical background?
question_hi_long: राजस्थान की राजधानी क्या है और उनका इतिहान क्या है?
